Description: Papyrus document with 5 lines of Coptic text written against the fibres (verso); perhaps part of a letter. EA 75314, 75313, 75312, 75311, 75310, 75309 are mounted together.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380768) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380768)
